SELECT EDU_ID educationId , EDU_CTGR educationCategory , EDU_TTL educationTitle , MBR_ID memberId , MAX_MBR maxMember , EDU_LOC educationLocation , EDU_CLCM educationCurriculum , EDU_INTR educationIntroduce , SRT_DATE startDate , END_DATE endDate , START_TM startTime , END_TM endTime , EDU_TP educationType , COST cost FROM EDU_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT NVL(AVG(RATIO), 0) FROM MBR M , EDU_INFO EI , EDU_HTR EH WHERE M.ID = #{ memberId } AND M.ID = EI.MBR_ID AND EI.EDU_ID = EH.EDU_ID
SELECT T.MBR_ID memberId , NM name , COMP_NM companyName , BUIS_NMB businessNumber , ANNUAL annual FROM TCHR_INFO T , MBR M WHERE T.MBR_ID = #{memberId} AND T.MBR_ID = M.ID

SELECT COUNT(MBR_ID) FROM TCHR_INFO
WHERE COMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT M.NM name , COMP_NM companyName , BUIS_NMB businessNumber , ANNUAL annual , MBR_ID memberId FROM MBR M , ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , TCHR_INFO.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM MBR M ,TCHR_INFO T WHERE M.ID = T.MBR_ID
AND M.NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND T.COMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY MBR_ID DESC ) TCHR_INFO WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endIndex} ) WHERE M.ID = MBR_ID AND RNUM >= #{startIndex}
